display: PDF Conjurer (backend) | End multi-column on PDF

AKa.caption: Insert the previous PDF Conjurer Server-side step result
AKa.name: config_info

AKc.caption: Multi column name
AKc.doc: This won't be shown in the pdf. Type in the multi column that you want to end here. Note that inserted elements must be between the Start and End actions.
AKc.name: multi_column_name

AKd.caption: Being repeated
AKd.doc: If this column is being repeated inside a repeating structure, use "yes".
AKd.name: being_repeated

AKe.caption: Repeating structure name
AKe.doc: The name of the repeating structure this multi column is going to be repeated into.
AKe.name: repeating_structure_name
